string.value: You traded the #bsparkling rock#k to Teo in Lith Harbor for the #bweird medicine#k. Now, to get it to #rMaya#k. Anyway, the medicine looks quite tasty. If you're ever thirsty and have no water handy, you'd be tempted to drink it yourself!

You returned to Henesys and handed Maya the weird medicine. Hopefully she'll get better after taking this. As a sign of thanks, Maya gave you 5,000 mesos and a #bbrown bamboo hat#k. The hat, er, well, it should keep your head protected under the hot sun, but it's kind of old and raggedy. And when you wear it, you feel like insects are crawling around. Nah, must be your imagination, right?
Thank you! Please take this medicine. #r#p1012101##k from #b#m100000000##k is sick again. This wil take care of the sickness a little bit...
Darn... My whole body aches! Uggggh. What, oh my...isn't that the #b#t4031006##k? How did you get it?? You're amazing! Cough...cough...
Um...can I take that medicine? I'll give you something for it... I beg you...please. I really need that medicine...
Thank you so much! This may cure my longtime illness... Here's something for you... Here are some mesos also as a sign of my appreciation.
Hurry and give #p1012101# the #b#t4031006##k that I gave you. #m100000000# is very far from here so make sure you don't lose that medicine...!
Haven't met #r#p1002001##k, yet? #p1002001# from #b#m104000000##k can definitely help you find some #p1002001#. Please find him.
Thank you! Please take this medicine. #r#p1012101##k from #b#m100000000##k is sick again. This wil take care of the sickness a little bit...
